name: Zasa - An AI Story (itch)
description:
Zasa is an extraordinary and challenging 3D Puzzle Game. Players are going to roleplay Zasa the Artificial Intelligence to finish the training missions from Dr.Mason by linking nodes in 3-dimensional space.

Features:

Refreshing gameplay -- Transformations and rotations in space system will train your way of thinking for space in a blowing-mind way.

Sophisticated levels -- 90 levels in a roll catering to your needs for challenging, from 2-Dimensional to 3-Dimensional, from friendly easy to hell hard.

Instructions:

Slide your finger to draw lines on the cube until the drawn pattern matches with the target.

<< or >>: rotate the cube.

Magnifier: get a hint.

Zasa icon: transform
